website_summaries.verdict: This roomy sleeping bag is perfect for couples who enjoy going camping in all weather.
pros: Large sleeping bag designed to fit 2 people comfortably
Made with a ripstop nylon shell and microfiber insulation
cons: This is a large bag that may be too big and heavy to take on a backpacking trip

customer_reviews.title: Grizzies! We love 'em zipped together but sure are hot!
customer_reviews.text: Know that you can zip two of these together and sleep four. We had the best camp out with our kids. Only problem was how hot they were. Probably not fair to deduct a star for that, I should have bought the cooler version. At least you can unzip from the bottom too so you can stick your feet out. I expect to have these for 10-15 years easily. BTW during the first use, a child peed overnight insight the sleeping bag - it happens. I handwashed and tried in the sun but it took days. Take extra caution around liquids with these. If you go tent camping in the rain, your tent best be 100% leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: SMF317

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, big-boy bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits my tent perfectly. Stores in its own, included, attached bag. Yes, it is a little tough because the bag doesn't have snap releases. You have to undo the strap to remove the storage bag. Quick trip to the fabric shop had it fixed for under $8. The bag is plush. I use it a 1 person bag because I like room! Camped by the beach for a few nights in 40 weather and it was plenty warm. The outside of the bag has a damp feeling all the time though while camping. The rounded head area is nice & helps support a pillow. Worth the investment! Zipper works well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: WRP

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough for tall guys
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big! I'm 6'6" tall and it is not deep enough for me unless I scrunch down a little though. Also since the opening is so wide on top cold air blows down inside unless I stuff the hole with a hoodie or something. When it's near freezing i tried adding 4 layers of blankets on top and bottom and I was cold wearing longjohns inside. I started putting my 20 degree bag inside and it's good to that cold.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bag for your buck if your looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bag for your buck if your looking for a car camping bag that will keep you warm and give you more than enough space to stretch out alone or with a partner. The lining is nice as it provides a comfortable welcome to the bag on a cold night. Traditionally lined bags feel cold when you first enter them and this bag, with the lining, makes crawling in a warming experience. This is the second bag of this type that I have owned, and I highly recommend this bag if your looking for a warm bag with allot of space for your car camping/cabin expeditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty winter sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: 2 person -25 canvas sleeping bag. Used 1x so far and it is so plush and warm. Used on top of a mattress at a cabin but given the loft not sure a mattress is needed. Great for rev or cabin but too big for even car camping.... think huge fluffy comforter x2. I got the canvas which is nice because it is not noisy or cold to the touch at first on the outside but wondering if I should have gotten the nylon to keep cleaner longer. Very nice bag as long as you do not have to carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: Durability was great and not nearly as difficult to get back into ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried this out for the first time this past weekend while camping. We purchased the +25 degree model. Temperatures got down to the lower 40's and was damp but we were warm inside the sleeping bag. I don't know how it would hold up if it got much colder than that. Durability was great and not nearly as difficult to get back into compression sack as I expected. A descent amount of water even got spilled on top of it and it just laid on top of it and did not seep in at all.
customer_reviews.author: ZacknChelsie

customer_reviews.title: warm, heavy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: oh how i wish they made just blankets too!!! the flannel is soooo soft!! highlight reel, we go camping in northern wisconsin every year over thanksgiving weekend. now while we have a good setup were still tent camping in 15 degree weather. the first night i was so hot i had to take off layers of clothing in the middle of the night. super warm super comfy not lightweight but big enough my 6'4" boyfriend was covered and we both had plenty of room to move about 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: meghan malach

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sleeping bag. My husband and I have used this in very cold night camping and I just have a light blanket with my in the sleeping bag and I sweat in the middle of the might. It keeps us very warm and it is a very high quality. I love the zippers on both sides so I don’t have to crawl over my husband to get out. I also love the Velcro on the sides so it stays closed. Overall it is a high quality sleeping bag that is incredibly warm. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Roomy Comfort but tough repack
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy for a two person bag; easy to work zippers--probably the best we have ever had ( have owned three other zip together bags); a two night stay in a cabin in moderate (40-50 F) temps really didn't test this bag for warmth. Had to use auxiliary straps to get the bag small & tight enough to get back in bag; the rounded head area is especially nice--sort of a built-in pillow area

customer_reviews.title: Solid 2 Person Bag
customer_reviews.text: Having used this bag several times now on our camping trips, I like it quite a bit. Soft and comfortable, not overly heavy (it's not a backpacking bag, note) and it has good solid zippers that show no sign of generating failures. Plenty roomy for two people, with plenty of length for taller folks. My only complaint is that it didn't come with a stuff sack, which you kind of expect to get with any bag over, say, $20-30. Still, a good buy overall, excellent quality for car camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D. Lossing

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: The perfect sleeping bag. My boyfriend and I fit amazingly in this bag. I am 5'5" and he's 5'11". We are both able to fit completely in the bag without showing our heads. Definitely kept us warm during those low 40 degree nights, but we haven't yet tested it in extreme low temp camping. Maybe this winter! It also kept us pretty dry from the dampness due to being by the water. Three kids fit in here too! Rolls up so nicely as well, I will definitely be buying another to have as backup.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C.

customer_reviews.title: The first one was 0 degree bag and it has worked great for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Grizzly two-person sleeping bag I've purchased. The first one was 0 degree bag and it has worked great for my purposes. I don't tent camp anymore so I use this in my travel trailers for the secondary or backup beds (think dinette and sofa beds). It fits two adults comfortably. Many times I unzip it all the way and use it as an oversized comforter. I'll use the -25 degree in my 1962 Shasta travel trailer that has no furnace. Can't wait to try this one out this weekend at 8,800 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I agreed this is the best sleeping bag! The inside lining is soft, with the extended top there’s no gap between your pillow and the bag. It’s way too big (and heavy) for backpacking but great for car camping. I like that the canvas doesn’t make noise like typical bags, and its cozier to lay on. We didn’t have any problems puting it back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: joshua c.

customer_reviews.title: Great double bag for cozy drive up camping.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag worked perfectly on a recent camping trip. It's a great size and the flannel on the inside is so much nicer than many of the other options out there. We were nice and cozy on a 45 degree nigh even though we had lots of extra space in the bag. I was able to stuff it back into the sack and cinch it down to it's original size which is very manageable for packing in the trunk of the car. It is heavy so it's certainly not meant for carrying in somewhere that you can't park nearby but for camping close to your car, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: ProfessorMom

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for myself and my husband and our 2 small dogs. We turn all of our sleeping bags inside out and it lets us move around more freely inside because it’s easy to get this twisted if one of you moves a lot. I am the guilty party there. But it kept us warm. It got down to 30 degrees at night and it kept us comfortable. I am very happy with this sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Chubb

customer_reviews.title: Soca,l 25° bag.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy bag. I like the canvas exterior. Dont really like having zipper heads in my face though and this has them on both sides. Carry bag is cheap. Cinch down buckles dont grab so compacting the bag as its supposed to doesnt work. One cinch strap popped right out of its stitching when I plopped the bag on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome (assuming you're not arguing with you're S/O)
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very durable, easy to pack, warm. Great for two people, I assume you would left a lot of heat escape with only one person. We have taken this into weather in the single digits and multiple nights in the teens. It'll keep you warm, it's not very breathable (flannel) but they have zippers on both sides (great idea for those of us who have to step outside in the middle of the night because you downed half a case of lite beer). Stuff sack is just as durable, it's heavy, definitely only for car camping, but worth it, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Fits two adults plus two young children.
customer_reviews.text: Fits two adults plus two young children. Feels very nice and warm. Won't need padding underneath this - plenty cushy. Top can be cinched down for better head coverage. Cotton version is very nice and not rustly, which would interfere with sleep. Humongous though - I bought a very large rolling duffel to pack this into so I don't have to pretend it's worth the time to stuff it into its stuff sack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy, HUGE sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This thing is HEAVY! I love the feeling of a nice heavy blanket, especially while camping. This thing is huge! A more accurate description would be "Two morbidly obese or three normal sized person sleeping bag" Construction is very solid, with a canvas exterior, flannel interior, heavy zippers and solid stitching. Cons: This thing is HEAVY! I hate the feeling of a heavy rucksack, especially while camping. It's just big, even in the provided stuffsack. Awesome for vehicle camping. If you're backpacking in, plan to have one person dedicated to sleeping bag duty.
customer_reviews.author: Rev.Doc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used only once so far, but it was great. We bought it bc we were afraid of being cold, but it turned out to be quote hot out. Despite the heat, we were able to stay comfortable in the sleeping bag. It even kept us dry in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Great night sleep in our two person sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great two person sleeping bag. My wife and I used it at the Julian Price Federal Park on an overnight camping trip where the temperature got down to 34 degrees and the wind was gusting to 30+ miles per hour. We slept warm and cozy in our Grizzly 0 degree bag! Had no problems getting the bag back into the stuff sack after we got home the next day. Strongly recommend this sleeping bag!!! We have the olive/canvas model and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Galloway

customer_reviews.title: greatest sleeping bag ever
customer_reviews.text: this is hands down the best sleeping bag ever. no problems with the zipper and it's perfect for just me or me and my dog. i didnt buy it for another person with me i bought it because i like to be comfortable when i am camping and this is comfy. the inside material is soft and it is warm at night. i camp for weeks or months at a time so in the last year I've probably used this bag more times than most people would use it in their lifetime and i can say that it has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bondi

customer_reviews.title: Good sleeping bag. Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: This keeps you nice and warm. It's a great sleeping bag for couples. However, it was really heavy to carry and very hard to roll back up/put into the carrier. It took 2 people to complete the task.
customer_reviews.author: CH89

customer_reviews.title: If you’re TALL, this is the sleeping bag for you & your other!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable, warm, comfy sleeping bag for 2 ever! My fiancé is 6’7” and this sleeping bag fits him and myself with extra room! Update: It’s now been a couple years since I bought this sleeping bag and I still love it! I’ve never had any problems with the bag, zippers or anything even after washing it several times! We use it every time we go camping and on trips where we need bedding! So comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love this sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sleeping bag. I was warm and cozy and slept like a baby . . however my fiancé seemed to sweat all night from being too hot in the sleeping bag. So if anything this sleeping keeps you too warm, but it was just right for me! Easily fit tied onto the back of my motorcycle too!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Paige

customer_reviews.title: Warm and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly warm sleeping bag and love that my husband and I can share one and still be close together when camping. Very high quality and the carry sleeve is definitely big enough to actually put the bag back in for transportation once you have used it. The only con i have with this sleeping bag is that the halves don’t fully unzip from each other only at the sides to the bottom so it is harder to wash. I will have to bring to laudromat. Otherwise great quality and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with good amount of room
customer_reviews.text: Great bag with good amount of room. About as much as you have on a full size bed. Only used it down to 25 but was comfortable and toasty warm. Taking it out to below 0 zero soon but fully expect to be warm with this bab for the wife and me. You are not going to be turning around much (used to king size bed myself) so if your both wander around in your bed at night you will not have a lot of room to do it in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is the jam. It fits me, my husband and our 50lb dog and keeps us all nice and cozy. Love that is has zippers on both sides and you can cinch the hood to make it more like a mummy bag. The neck bolster keeps out the drafts and it even comes with a really nice stuff sack.The interior flannel is really soft and cozy. I am more impressed with this bag that I was expecting. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, but bulky!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I use this bag occasionally while camping. As the reviews state, this bag is pretty massive, but incredibly warm and comfortable. We slept in it over 3 nights in temperatures around 10-15 degrees and we were warm and toasty. My only recommendation would be that it needs to be able to zip completely in half so one person doesn't need to lug it all the way out to a back-country camping spot. But for regular camping that you don't have to hike to, Great bag.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT L.

customer_reviews.title: If you like cold camping but not freezing at night this is the bag for you!
customer_reviews.text: We searched, and searched, and searched for a 2 person bag we liked. The grizzly is it! At 6'1" I am comfortable in the bag. Love the beefy zippers and breeze protection along the zipper. This bag provides amazing warmth.....even when it is a little wet! We've had hard rains soak up through the tent floor overnight....we slept right through it and just laid the bag out to dry the next day.
customer_reviews.author: CJF

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits myself
customer_reviews.text: Warmest, largest sleeping bag I could have asked for. Easily fits myself, my daughter, and my boyfriend. It keeps warm even on the coldest nights. It's difficult to wash, as it is so bulky, but a quick trip to the Laundromat is all it takes to clean the sleeping bag effectively. Best sleeping bag I've ever owned, extremely durable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best two person sleeping bag for colder weather.
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping bag is perfect for two wanting to stay warm and comfortable in colder weather. It's a little heavy and bulky for long range camping trips but perfect if you are camping out of a vehicle or ATV with trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag. My wife and I tried it out a few weeks back. It wasn't very cold out; however, I think that it would be more than enough to keep you warm in sub 50 degree weather. I first thought the bag looked kind of small; however, it's pretty much a standard queen size. There are zippers on both sides so you don't need to climb over the other to get out. It is very soft. The plush head section is not really a pillow, but soft and could be enough. However, I would recommend having your own pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. We both love to go camping and we have always joked about getting a 2 person sleeping bag. This bag is amazing! Super durable and sturdy canvas on the outside, with plushy warm flannel lining on the inside. It is so roomy! I think we could honestly fit 3 people inside comfortably. I love the pillow at the top, this is a great deal especially for the price! I almost purchased the 2 person bag from north face but it was quite a bit more $$$ and this bag had better reviews. I can see why! Would purchase again and again
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised, super warm and of the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: First off, just a little side note, my bag was chocolate brown, not olive like in the picture which it's TOTALLY fine because the color was the only thing I was worried about(and yes it did say olive on the box). But the bag is super high quality, soft, and most importantly, super warm. Takes a second to warm up but the canvas does a awesome job of keeping the heat in and the cold out. I've used it a couple times already and it still looks brand new. I feel I'm going to get many many years out of this bag if not the rest of my life! Really happy with it, exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Pelzl

customer_reviews.title: We both fit in it and could easily fit another adult or 2 small kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag for car camping with my wife. We both fit in it and could easily fit another adult or 2 small kids. Easily. Quality seems top notch. Tough material and zippers are heavy duty. It was warm when used in the back of a RAV4 (on a small inflatable mattress) in the Seattle, WA area. So it wasn't too cold outside (maybe 50) but it performed as expected.
customer_reviews.author: seahawk

customer_reviews.title: This sleeping bag is amazing. We've only used it once so far in ...
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is amazing. We've only used it once so far in about 45 degree weather, but it worked very well. We actually unzipped the sides because it was too warm for us. I think it would work well in colder weather. Also it is very spacious which is what we wanted because we like to stretch out throughout the night. It is very comfortable and it looks good too. And it was way easier than I thought it would be to roll it back up.
customer_reviews.author: JMZ

customer_reviews.title: Fleece inside is soft and comfortable. Of course
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t field tested this yet but it certainly looks and feels as if it will do the job. Canvas outside should be dog proof. Fleece inside is soft and comfortable. Of course, canvas and fleece will never make it into the backpack, this will be a great car camping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G Roark

customer_reviews.title: Warm, cozy, and roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My spouse and I bought this for our CVT tent. Very comfortable and roomy for the two of us and our two Yorkies. Kept us warm on some cold nights. Our favorite thing about it is that you can unzip from either side of you get hot. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Does great!
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. This was bought for someone who lives in camper with only a small heater. It's been working great for them through the cold months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Yaaay!! for Amazon!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I purchased this wonderful bag in Nov of 2013.I use it in my RV only, not outdoors. The metal zipper separated and I was unable to fix it. I called Grizzly, they were not sympathetic and said I had to contact Amazon, I did. Tristin in Customer service rode in on his white horse and saved the day!!.He verified my order, the date it was ordered and is sending me a free replacement with a return shipment label...Can't get any better than that!...just sayin...:)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Toasty
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job keeping myself and my partner warm on a cold camping trip. The only thing that was challenging was trying to get in or out of the bag while someone else is in it and it's all zipped up. Not impossible but difficult, getting the zippers down was not as easy as it could've been.Regardless I still love it and will keep on using it time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: Demonite

customer_reviews.title: Durable, non-slip canvas outside. Warm, soft inside. Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and soft on the inside. 0 degree option is nice and warm, but will work in warmer weather without sweating you out. I highly recommend the canvas outside. Very durable and you don't slide around and have the cheap feeling of nylon. Zippers and stitching seem very durable to... But haven't been tested in rough conditions yet. I might buy a second one, I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: cozy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, and cozy. Something I recommend for those couples that go camping! It'll keep you extremely toasty when it's cold out. I didn't want to leave the tent because of this sleeping bag, got a good nights sleep from it. Easy to store, comes with a bag that makes compression so much easier, we actually made it smaller and more compact than its original packing!! Kinda heavy not something I'd carry on my back all day long.
customer_reviews.author: KellyMae

customer_reviews.title: I love the flannel print and colors
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Took it camping in Tahoe and it was so comfy. I love the flannel print and colors. Zippers on both sides for easy in/out. Just like other bags it's a pain to get back into the large duffle bag, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD QUALITY, PRODUCT IS AS BIG AS A QUEEN ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD QUALITY, PRODUCT IS AS BIG AS A QUEEN SIZE BED, AND IS VERY WARM AND COMFORTABLE. WAS VERY IMPRESSED WITH QUALITY OF THE ZIPPERS AND THE ZIP STOPPER SO YOU CANT RIP OPEN THE ZIPPERS IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT AND FREEZE AND BE STUCK WITH A ZIP-LESS SLEEPING BAG. IVE GONE THROUGH MANY SLEEPING BAGS AND THIS IS THE BEST QUALITY AND FAVORITE YET! WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Temperature rating way off
customer_reviews.text: It’s made very well and of great quality but even at 25° to 40° it’s very cold. Definitely don’t think it’ll live up to 0° as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: jimmycorn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect RV bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic, large sleeping bag. Made out of durable canvas, it's perfect for use in the van or toy hauler. I now have two of them, can't recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Don Krause

customer_reviews.title: super warm, comfy. solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction. I bought the canvas outside. I tested it in 50 degree farenheit by myself in just shorts and was sweating when it was fully zipped. I am confident that it will perform at 32 degrees, and probably below that if you are a smart camper. Will give 5 stars when i can prove it. Having the option to share the bag is awesome. With two healthy people in there im sure you'd be toasty at zero degrees farenheit.
customer_reviews.author: christopherlinares

customer_reviews.title: and this bag has been truly wonderful. I prefer the canvas cover to the other ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been camping a lot this winter, and this bag has been truly wonderful. I prefer the canvas cover to the other one because it doesn't make so much noise when I move around. I've been in temps as low as 2*F and with my fleece sheets inside, and I was so warm and comfortable I am certain that -10* won't be a problem. For whatever reason, I waited until I could find this bag in the blue canvas, but it was absolutely worth the wait - the bag is beautiful, as well as warm. I'd absolutely buy again, but I don't think I'll ever need to!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great material!
customer_reviews.text: The material is perfect for camping! The inside of the sleeping bag is true a flannel material and the outer material is a thicker material (canvas). Definitely heavy duty and to withstand cold temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in 30 degree weather
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in 30 degree weather!!! Only used the one time and was impressed. When I received from amazon the carrying bag had been cut by a box knife or similar rendering it useless. Love the sleeping bag but need a carrying bag. Amazon never responded when I notified them.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Secord

customer_reviews.title: This is great for camping with my husband
customer_reviews.text: This is great for camping with my husband! It's wide, roomy, & has zippers on both sizes. Our 55-lb dog will even squeeze in between us. It's warm enough for cold nights, & the side zippers work great for warmer nights. Plus it fits nicely into its case, so it's easy to pack up & put away.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Nice Big Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a longer camping trip with my wife. It is big and comfy to sleep in. The material is pretty thick. With two bodies, neither of us was cold in this sleeping bag when we slept in Estes Park, CO. Repacking it takes two people given its size.
customer_reviews.author: RMIII

customer_reviews.title: I do wish it had a better neck baffle to keep the warm air in and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this sleeping bag camping in the back of my truck with my girlfriend. The coldest time we used it was around 5 degrees. It's extremely warm. I do wish it had a better neck baffle to keep the warm air in and cold air out. It's very roomy and thick, when packed it is still enormous, and it's 100% a glamping bag, but definitely warm.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Keeps you toasty. Smaller than I expected it to be. Literally two people and may be one small child is too tight. Expensive too. That said, it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: CHADABE

customer_reviews.title: I have seen him recently and he said that the sleeping bag is wonderful. It has kept him super warm on some ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a homeless man who only had 1 blanket. I have seen him recently and he said that the sleeping bag is wonderful. It has kept him super warm on some very cold nights. I'm just sorry I can't afford to give out several of them to the homeless people, so that many others could have a warm place to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: nanny76c

customer_reviews.title: this is all you need!
customer_reviews.text: Used this in 0-10 degree temperature in my sprinter van with no heater. I give off heat so I wanted a double in case I overheat. This bag is simply awesome
customer_reviews.author: Christian Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We have family who has grizzly 2 person sleeping bags and decided it was worth getting and have used it a few times and LOVE IT! It makes all the difference when you get some good sleep in a warm sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! Very comfortable, keeps me warm. It’s very good quality. Took the sleeping camping the weekend o got it and never got cold once in the night. There are zippers in both sides which is very convenient the zippers can be a little stubborn at times but I think that’s just because they are so large, they haven’t caught on the frantic at all which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Although we only used it once during this past summer. It's awesome. I love it and its worth it. I would recommend buying this
customer_reviews.author: nohope

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cozy, warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleeping bag. I haven't owned it for long, yet, and we just tried it out two nights in a row with lows around 25F but we stayed warm and toasty all night long. It's roomy and soft. As other reviews mention it IS pretty darn heavy and bulky, but for car camping it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Laima R

customer_reviews.title: We love that aspect of it
customer_reviews.text: So warm and spacious! We love that aspect of it. But the outside material is so noisy, it often woke us up in the night as we shifted.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy/warm bag for 2+ people
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy and warm sleeping bag. I love the dual zippers on the sides and the tall size. I'm 6' and it still wraps over my head sleeping in it with my wife. The outer material is durable and I'm not as worried about tearing it like many other bags. The interior is real comfortable and easy to fall asleep in with freezing Temps. We also didn't turn blue like other reviews mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: KMiller

customer_reviews.title: Best bag I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best bag I've ever owned. I use it for my rooftop tent. The stuff bag works fine. Don't understand the bad reviews. You do have to roll it tight prior to stuffing it in the bag. It fits just fine if you take a few minutes to roll it up properly. Then smash it a bit to get the air out and pull the straps down. Easy. Warm and very cushy. You'll have to unzip it sometimes, it's so warm!
customer_reviews.author: William F. Caton

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleeping bag! Not too heavy, yet keeps you toasty warm! Generously sized with more than enough room for two adults. Both sides zip up so each person can get in and out easy. The bag is one large bag - not two bags zipped together (there is no zipper along the bottom). This may present an issue when I need to wash it - will probably have to bring it to the cleaners, or use the industrial size washer at a laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morici

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to try it out!!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's awesome...but it'll be a while before I get to actually test it. The temperatures are within the rated range, but there is too much snow to tent camp for this man!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: came with a busted zipper but still very good and warm
customer_reviews.author: orlando gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: and the draw stings fall inside and you end up sleeping on them way too easily. I was fairly comfortable with my wife and ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the velco at the top seems a bit cheap, and the draw stings fall inside and you end up sleeping on them way too easily. I was fairly comfortable with my wife and I in it during a 45degree night in indiana.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M

customer_reviews.title: Best sleeping bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love my huge bag so much, i got this for my son for his Christmas Birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: You can tell the product is quality as soon as it arrives. The materials used were great, and the flannel inside is super soft and comfortable to sleep in. Took it overnight up into northern Michigan where the temperature dropped into the 40s at night. I got warm enough I had to unzip the side to let out some heat. I'd absolutely buy one again! I only wish I hadn't cut part of the bag that stores it when I was opening the box it came in. Oops! If looking for a two person bag, get it. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase and Extremely Warm
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Warm! Great fit! The two zippers, one on each side, were also very helpful. I was able to get in and out of the bag without disturbing my girlfriend. I did get a bit of water on the outside of the shell and there were not any problems at all about being wet inside. Honestly it was the best sleeping bag purchase that I made.
customer_reviews.author: tac194

customer_reviews.title: Great double sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Fiancé loved it. Extra warm. Very lightweight! Sadly I didn't make the first camp out in it but he said it's plenty large for us both and he's 6'1" so the extra length was nice he stated.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon E.Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: the stuff sack is super handy
customer_reviews.text: Big and warm, the stuff sack is super handy too
customer_reviews.author: vwmk1man

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this Sleeping bag. Super cozy and soft. Keeps us warm and comfortably fits the two of us with plenty of room. If your out in weather colder then 30 degrees grab an extra blanket to throw over you just in case! The heavy duty zippers are easy to use and don't snag. They stay in place overnight with the velcro stay flap. The extra padding around the pillow area is nice, very soft and helps hold the pillows in place.
customer_reviews.author: J BLandy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Very warm and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty sleeping bag. I bought to camp with my family. I slept in here with my two young children. We fit great and we’re extremely warm. Looked great out of the box with no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This double sleeping bag will be great for 3-season camping
customer_reviews.text: This double sleeping bag will be great for 3-season camping, two adults will fit comfortably. It is well-constructed and he inside flannel lining is soft and warm. It's pretty comfy, I would recommend for people who like to snuggle with their partner.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gross

customer_reviews.title: GIANT Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Giant comfortable and surprisingly easy to pack away. My wife and I wanted a bag we could share on our drive up "car-camp" trips; and this bag was exactly what we wanted. Bag is about the size of a queen mattress. No good for single use though, the bag weighs too much and takes up too much space for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W

customer_reviews.title: ... and I purchased this for a music festival and LOVED IT! The lining felt like a blanket
customer_reviews.text: My significant other and I purchased this for a music festival and LOVED IT! The lining felt like a blanket. It was so warm we kept both zippers unzipped all the way to our feet. It's not as difficult to get back in the bag as most people are saying. It's definitely easier with two people though.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: This sleeping bag is built to last!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice 2 person sleeping bag! I can't wait to use it camping. This sleeping bag will definitely keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: Used this while camping in Yosemite in April and it was perfect, not too warm not too cold! The fleece lining on the inside is soft and warm. It's very heavy and I definitely wouldn't recommend it if you have a hike in campsite, but since we have a young child that really isn't an issue for us. I just have to figure out how to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: TreeseReese

customer_reviews.title: My fiancee and I both fit comfortably inside of it
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This sleeping bag is HUGE. My fiancee and I both fit comfortably inside of it, and it is very cushioned. It will keep you plenty warm, and if you don't want to sleep in it, sleep on it. It makes a great mattress pad for warm seasons.
customer_reviews.author: kalyn c

customer_reviews.title: So warm!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so well made and warm! Perfect for cuddling
customer_reviews.author: hiyou87

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm, except your head lol
customer_reviews.text: This thing keeps you warm! Been in multiple camping trips during winter months and never got cold from neck below. Of course my head was freezing but that is not the bags fault.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Big, comfy, and perfect for two!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent 2 person sleeping bag for camping next to your car or rv! It does take up a lot of space and can be troublesome to get into the bag...but other then that, it keeps us both comfortable in a variety of temperatures. One would expect it to be big, but it is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Obvious

customer_reviews.title: bulky, but roomy and warm
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bag to take hiking, but if your looking for a bag big enough for two, this is the one. I have taken it on two colorado mountain camping trips. One with the wife, one alone. Slept sound and warm both times down in the low 30's. Best if you strip down to your skivies, so you get the full benefits of the bag and your body heat.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN H. WOOD

customer_reviews.title: This sleeping bag is awesome and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is awesome and I highly recommend it. Although purchased for two, I used it for the first time alone in the dampness and rain in 40 degree temps in Nor. Ca, and had one of the best nights of sleep ever! I did not want to get out of bed! I highly recommend it to use with one of the Serta inflatable mattresses. Better than my bed at home! :) And, I actually managed to get it back into the awesome provided carrying case without too much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable sleeping bag ever! I really pondered just putting this on my bed to sleep in because it felt better than my bed at home. It is warm as advertised as well and 2 people can easily sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: LD27

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs up 👍🏼 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: It’s very roomy. Great quality kept us warm and comfy for 4 nights in the Sierras!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Croslow

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet! Quite warm
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sweet! Quite warm, definitely most comfy sleeping bag ever. It's very heavy and you gotta be a weight lifter to pack it up in the stuff sack.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Best, most cozy, high quality sleeping bag ever.
customer_reviews.text: I've camped with the exact same sleeping bag for a few years and it was amazing. I lost it recently and had to replace it. GET ONE!!!!...Cuz you need it and want it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sleeping bag I've purchased, it keeps you warm and with plenty of room for my girlfriend and I it's perfect for any camping trip. The outside is nice and durable and the inside is soft and warm flannel
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my - this sleeping bag is thick and I'm sure it will be warm. Wanted to get one that will work in really cold weather. There is nothing worse than freezing in the middle of the night while camping. We can always throw the top off and cover up with a light blanket if it is too warm....
customer_reviews.author: Grammie to10

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I couldn't wait to receive this 2 person bag after reading the positive reviews. We were amazed at how warm we stayed when sleeping in below freezing temperatures- I didn't wake up shivering and my husband even said he got too warm at one point. This is a great sleeping bag and I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: great 2 person sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a good car camping 2 person sleeping bag this is it. It's big but it rolls up and fits easy in its bag. Our temp got down to 40 and we were both just fine. Wife loved since she's almost always cold and like the shared body warmth
customer_reviews.author: Se

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: worked great while camping in the sierras. was almost to warm in 50 degree weather but was not too bad just had to unzip the sides a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: I took this bag to northern Washington State this spring. I put it on a queen size bed in the motorhome that I was borrowing and it lapped over both sides and the end. There was little heat in the motorhome and the temperatures got down to freezing every night, but the bag kept me very warm. I could see where you could get down to zero easily and still stay comfortable. I love canvas bags and flannel is always comfortable. All in all an awesome bag I would recommend it to anybody. Especially people who like lots of space and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: NailDriver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so warm and so comfortable it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: both of us ended up shedding layers down to a t-shirt and shorts and were still more than comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have a foam mattress fitted for the back of my Xterra and this sleeping bag was used on top of that for some cold weather camping. Temperatures were in the single digits and this bag was more than enough, both of us ended up shedding layers down to a t-shirt and shorts and were still more than comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I use this sleeping bag for a mattress when I'm not camping it's so thick. Heavy duty material. Big zipper that won't break without some seriouse force. And it's big enough for two people to comfortably get into without getting all tangled up.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bevan

product_meta.title: Grizzly by Black Pine 2-Person Sleeping Bag
product_meta.description:
Grizzly bags offer the most durable comfortable and warm bags on the market with all the features that you would expect from Black Pine Sports our bags are wider and longer than the competition with the choice of either a canvas shell or rip-stop shell an

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
For couples camping, the Grizzly 2 Person -25 ripstop sleeping bag shares the same superior insulation and comfort features you'll find in the Grizzly one-person version, but with a larger sleeping area to accommodate two adult sleepers. Don't be surprised if a child or the family dog wants to climb in with you -- it's that big. It also zips from both sides, so you won't have to wake your sleeping partner to exit in the middle of the night. The durable ripstop nylon shell is sewn with a two-layer offset construction, ensuring the seams don't overlap to prevent cold spots. The super-large windstop walls along the zippers, thick chest baffles, and double-layer offset quilting will keep everyone toasty, while the giant built-in hood helps keep warmth from escaping at head level. Rated to -25 degrees F, this bag features a microfiber insulation fill as well as a flannel lining to add to the cozy factor. It measures 90 inches long and 65 inches wide (shoulder to foot), with a 9 pound fill weight and a 14.5 pound overall bag weight. Machine washable on the gentle cycle, it should be hung to dry. Stuff sack with compression straps included. Since 1999, Black Pine Sports has been offering the coziest sleeping bags, the best in family camping tents, backpacking gear, self-inflating air mattresses, and more with its Black Pine, The Backside, and Grizzly brands.
feature_bullets: Roomy two-person ripstop sleeping bag rated to -25 degrees F, great for winter camping
Durable ripstop nylon shell with two-layer offset construction for superior warmth
Microfiber insulation, oversized draft tubes, and chest baffles
Flannel lining; zips open from both sides
Measures 90 inches long, 65 inches wide (shoulder to foot); weighs 14.5 pounds
